scripts.setup: npm run build && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/setup.js | pino-pretty
scripts.force-setup: npm run build && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/setup.js -f | pino-pretty
scripts.start: npm run build && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/server.js | pino-pretty
scripts.dev: npm run force-setup && nodemon --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/server.js | pino-pretty
